imgDesc.text: When <color=#ffe14b>Geo</color> comes into contact with <color=#ffe14b>Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Crystallize</color> will be triggered!

This type of elemental reaction can generate corresponding Elemental Shards and provide your character with various <color=#ffe14b>Elemental Shields</color> ! Use Crystallize to effectively reduce DMG taken in battle.
